item.title: My Google Cloud Technology Journey as Mid Career Switch
item.description: Intro Recently, I saw the news about the launch of a scholarship programme by Google to help 5,000 more Singaporeans acquire “in-demand digital skills” and it gave me an idea to share about my journey as one of the graduates. It has been exactly a year since I have joined Googleâ€™s Skills Ignition Cloud Technology program (Pathway 1). I have come a long way since then and managed to land myself a Cloud Engineer role in a bank.
